title: GP suddenly mega popular?
body: last 7 games ive played have had 8 gankplanks in them.. did someone play him in lck or something or is it just sheer chance? 3 games there was one on each team lol. sick of seeing him already =P

replies.body: Because of lethality and the meta, gangplanks have struggled for awhile because of the katarina, leblanc, darius meta
yeah popular NA D5 streamer tobias fate has been gaining popularity lately, and so has his main champ.

hes got pretty good appeal as a top laner. hes got good poke with q+e his w(eat some oranges and k) is great for the laning phase against most of the top meta, he can afk farm in lane and still provide good ults for team mates and when he gets to late game he can destroy half your team with a few barrels.
